review.title: “Nice company to work on.”
review.pros: Pros – You can have a great time if you are loyal to the customers, because customers know that you are good in a company that is not so good. You can shine as a sales person.
review.cons: Cons – Like all companies in Greece, they have some economic difficulties, so they don't pay their employees, some times they pay half a salary.
review.advice-to-management: No, I would not recommend this company to a friend
